title: Murky Approach
story: The thick clouds obscure the castle's highest spires, providing an unusual cover for those who would approach the sleeping predators. Yet, the same gloom makes precision difficult.
effect: During this Day phase, heroes may move up to 6 steps instead of 4, though Stairwell steps still count as 2 steps. However, any combat roll against a Vampire Sister or attempt to Stake a sleeping Vampire in the Crypt suffers -1 to the D6 roll (e.g., a roll of 5 becomes 4, requiring a 6 to hit or succeed).
